Service Details: - Offers the research‐based, scientific, RoadSafetyBC assessment tool- Only drivers with reported cognitive impairment are referred by the Superintendent to have an assessment- Offers two assessments: an in-office assessment, performed on a touch-sensitive screen, and an on-road evaluation which is conducted in a dual-brake vehicle- Drivers who do not pass the in-office assessment are offered a secondary opportunity to demonstrate their cognitive fitness to continue driving through an on-road evaluation- RoadSafetyBC pays the cost of all DriveABLE assessments it requests
How to Apply: Please call the toll free number
Address & Map: Kelowna General Hospital, Strathcona Building, Rehabilitation2268 Pandosy StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1T2View MapQuest Map
